title: Saint Croix Island International Historic Site: Education
body: Learn From Our Past  When life hung precariously in the balance, icy and isolated, people came together to survive and in turn shaped history. There are many ways to experience parks as classrooms, and be sure to take advantage of the park's professional development opportunities.                  Traveling Trunks Learn about the struggles that solidified Saint Croix Island's place in history and the interwoven lives of the Passamaquoddy Tribe. Read More        Teacher Workshops Engage your students in the world around them, both past and present with classroom materials you build in our workshops. Read More        Events of 1604-1605 Discover the events that took place during the short-lived, but historically important, settlement on Saint Croix Island. Read More
